channel.title: E3 2012- Predictions? Hopes? Worries?
channel.description:
...and do forgive me if there's already a thread like this...
What will happen? Is there anything you want to see from anyone in particular (aside from vALVE... :frowning: although who knows what's really going to happen)? Games? Systems?
What are both the best and worst things that may (or may not) be shown? Thoughts on rumors? Opinions, anyone?
For me, I like many hope that those 20 "gaming experiences" Sony's promising include some PSV games- new ones that have been [i]unannounced so far[/i]. I really want to see some more genres- I'd really like a flight simulator of some kind.
I also hope Crytek has something good- CryEngine 4 will hopefully bring the best of CryEngine 2 and 3 into something awesome. I'm betting we'll see some more of Crysis 3- maybe a playable demo (it could be a bit early for that, but it's possible).

About

The Game

Reset is a single player co-op first person puzzle game with a strong emphasis on story and atmosphere. The unique game mechanic in Reset is the ability to travel back in time to solve puzzles co-operatively, with yourself.

Tricky…:awesome:

It kinda was a waste for me, the only game that I ever got for it that I wanted to sit through was MGS4 when I first got it.

item.dc:creator: somewhere_in_new_mex
item.description:
I have this weird feeling that the amount of stuff Sony releases for the Vita will be disappointing. If there’s anything they need to promote now it’s the Vita, and I really hope they don’t screw it up by announcing ten PS3 games and ten Vita games. Nothing against the PS3- it has a lots of great games already and is selling fine.

item.title: E3 2012- Predictions? Hopes? Worries?
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
somewhere in new mexico:

some PSV games

This, pretty much. I love the system, it’s significantly better than Nintendo’s current handheld, but it doesn’t have much software yet. I definitely won’t argue against some PS3/360 ports, but it would be nice to get original content, since I own both a PS3 and a 360. I doubt they’ll announce it at E3, (though it is possible, they announced FF7 at E3) but I want them to add PS1 game compatability like they said they would. I have a handfull of great PS1 games that I’ve bought on the PSN that I’m waiting to re-play because remote play, while a nifty feature, sucks, and I can’t always sit in front of the TV for hours to play some of the awesome PS1 RPGs.

I am also curious to hear more news about the coming new consoles. I’ve pretty much sworn off buying a new console at least for a while, but I am curious where they’ll go with them. I’m passing on the Wii U for a couple reasons: accessories are going to be expensive, and the name reminds me off that scene from Better Off Dead. I’ll definitely skip the next Xbox if Microsoft goes through with the no used games rumor. (I rarely buy used, but it’s still BS)

I guess as far as specific games or companies go, I’m definitely looking forward to seeing of Bethesda drops any hints of Fallout 4, and I am eager to hear anything about Doom 4. Obviously I want Valve to announce HL3/EP3. I might be interested in a new Pokemon game if Nintendo is ready to share what they’ve been working on.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2012- Predictions? Hopes? Worries?
item.dc:creator: ChancyWancy
item.description:
I’d like to change my predictions to something completely out of the blue.

Jak And Daxter 4: PS3/PSVita
Ratchet And Clank Vita: PSVita
New Mature Nintendo IP: Wii U (To see if they could pull something like that off)
New Star Fox: Wii U
New F-Zero: Wii U (Thanks for unintentionally reminding me of the franchise, Garcian Smith.)
Super Smash Bros: Wii U/3DS
Conker’s Bad Fur Day Sequel: Xbox 360?
Donkey Kong 3D Platformer/Beat-Em-Up: Wii U
2D Mario Game with new art style/gameplay mechanics: 3DS
Paper Mario: Wii U
Final Fantasy game that plays like Final Fantasy X: PS3/360/Wii U
New BUNGiE IP: PC/Xbox 360/PS3/Wii U
New VALVe IP (in conjunction to surprise HL3 announcement, but let’s not get into that): PC
Beyond Good & Evil 2: PC/Next Gen Consoles
Duke Nukem Forever Sequel that doesn’t eat nuts: PC
New Deus Ex Game: PC
Psychonauts 2: PC/360/PS3/Wii U
Fallout 4: PC/360/PS3
New Wii VC Titles (Mystical Ninja: Starring Goemon, please): Wii
Rayman 4: Wii U/Wii/360/PS3/iOS/Android/3DS/Vita/prettymucheverywherejustlikeRayman2

Read full topic
